message: Bob, let's start with a reasonably fair split. I propose we take $550,000 and you take $450,000. This way we both benefit from ending the game quickly.
Alice, your offer was a bit too generous towards yourself. Let's be practical - I'll take a larger share to end this quickly, considering the money will be worth less if we drag it out.
Bob, I understand your point about ending this quickly. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take slightly less than last time, you take slightly more. $495,000 for me, $505,000 for you.
